basic.description:
This course surveys current best practices for implementing attractive, usable, secure and maintainable web and mobile applications. Other issues considered include: accessibility, platform and browser independence, licensing of intellectual property, scalability, user privacy, and using web technologies in mobile development.
LEARNING HOURS    120 (36L;48O;36P)
basic.subject: CISC
basic.title: Web and Mobile Applications

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite     Level 2 and (CISC101 or CISC110 or CISC121 or permission of the Department).
